mapper.select: select no, title, to_char(writedate, 'YY-MM-DD') writedate, hit from notice order by no desc
select no, title, content, to_char(writedate, 'YY-MM-DD') writedate from notice where no=#{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into notice(no, title, userid, content) values(noticeSq.nextval, #{title}, 'goguma', #{content})
mapper.update: update notice set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where no=#{no} and userid='goguma'
mapper.delete: delete from notice where no=#{param1} and userid='goguma'
